message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CE, cs.CR, cs.DS

The paper involves the use of deep reinforcement learning to optimize customer relationship management, which falls under the category of machine learning and artificial intelligence. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves the use of metrics and data analysis, which could fall under cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the paper discusses the use of direct marketing actions, which could fall under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
